description.zh-cn: 汉高祖刘邦第七子，封淮南王。因谋反被汉文帝流放蜀郡，在途中绝食自杀。
description.en: The seventh son of Emperor Gaozu of Han (Liu Bang), enfeoffed as the King of Huainan. He was exiled to Shu Commandery by Emperor Wen for treason and committed suicide by starvation on the way.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝的开国皇帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Han Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 汉初赵王，刘邦的女婿。
description.en: King of Zhao in the early Han Dynasty, son-in-law of Liu Bang.

description.zh-cn: 原为赵王张敖的姬妾，后为刘邦侍寝并生下刘长。
description.en: Originally a concubine of Zhang Ao, King of Zhao. She was presented to Liu Bang and gave birth to Liu Chang.

description.zh-cn: 西汉时期的一个诸侯王爵位。
description.en: A vassal king title during the Western Han Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第五位皇帝，刘邦之子，刘长之兄。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Western Han Dynasty, son of Liu Bang and elder brother of Liu Chang.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝时期的行政区划，位于今四川省。
description.en: An administrative commandery during the Han Dynasty, located in modern-day Sichuan Province.

description.zh-cn: 刘长长子，继承淮南王爵位，主编了《淮南子》。
description.en: The eldest son of Liu Chang, who inherited the title of King of Huainan and was the patron for the compilation of the Huainanzi.

description.zh-cn: 西汉皇族淮南王刘安及其门客集体编写的一部道家著作。
description.en: A Daoist classic compiled under the patronage of Liu An, King of Huainan, during the Western Han Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 汉初赵国国相，曾策划暗杀刘邦。
description.en: Chancellor of the Kingdom of Zhao in the early Han Dynasty, who plotted to assassinate Liu Bang.

description.zh-cn: 汉初大臣，因未尽力营救刘长之母赵姬而被刘长刺杀。
description.en: An official in the early Han Dynasty who was assassinated by Liu Chang for failing to rescue his mother, Consort Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖刘邦的皇后，后为皇太后，抚养了刘长。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Gaozu of Han (Liu Bang), later the Empress Dowager, who raised Liu Chang.

description.zh-cn: 秦末汉初名将，曾受封为淮南王，后因谋反被杀。
description.en: A prominent general during the late Qin and early Han dynasties. He was enfeoffed as the King of Huainan but was later executed for rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 汉初大臣，与周勃等人一同平定诸吕之乱。
description.en: An official of the early Han Dynasty who, along with Zhou Bo and others, suppressed the Lü Clan Disturbance.

description.zh-cn: 汉初大臣，与陈平等元老一同平定诸吕之乱。
description.en: An official of the early Han Dynasty who, along with Chen Ping and other senior statesmen, suppressed the Lü Clan Disturbance.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖刘邦皇后吕雉死后，以陈平、周勃为首的功臣集团与刘氏皇族联合，铲除吕氏外戚势力的政治事件。
description.en: After the death of Empress Lü Zhi, wife of Emperor Gaozu of Han, a political event where the coalition of meritorious officials led by Chen Ping and Zhou Bo, along with the Liu imperial clan, eliminated the power of the Lü consort clan.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦的长孙，齐王。在“夷灭诸吕”后曾试图争夺皇位。
description.en: The eldest grandson of Liu Bang, the King of Qi. He attempted to contend for the imperial throne after the Lü Clan Disturbance.

description.zh-cn: 古代活跃于欧亚大陆北部的游牧民族部落联盟。
description.en: A tribal confederation of nomadic peoples who inhabited the eastern Eurasian Steppe.

description.zh-cn: 古代存在于今中国福建省一带的王国。
description.en: An ancient kingdom located in the modern-day Fujian province of China.

description.zh-cn: 西汉丞相，在刘长谋反事败后，主张将其处死。
description.en: Chancellor of the Western Han Dynasty who advocated for the execution of Liu Chang after his rebellion plot was exposed.

description.zh-cn: 西汉大臣，曾反对将刘长流放，预言其会在途中自杀。
description.en: An official of the Western Han Dynasty who opposed the exile of Liu Chang, predicting he would commit suicide on the way.

description.zh-cn: 刘长之子，曾为衡山王、济北王。
description.en: Son of Liu Chang, who served as the King of Hengshan and later the King of Jibei.

description.zh-cn: 刘长之子，曾为庐江王、衡山王，后因谋反国除。
description.en: Son of Liu Chang, who served as the King of Lujiang and later the King of Hengshan; his kingdom was abolished after a rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 刘长之子，封东城侯，早逝无后。
description.en: Son of Liu Chang, enfeoffed as the Marquis of Dongcheng, who died young without an heir.

description.zh-cn: 刘长是汉高祖刘邦的第七个儿子。
description.en: Liu Chang was the seventh son of Emperor Gaozu of Han, Liu Bang.

description.zh-cn: 刘长由赵姬所生。
description.en: Liu Chang was born to Consort Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 赵王张敖将姬妾赵姬献给刘邦侍寝，赵姬因此怀孕生下刘长。
description.en: Zhang Ao, King of Zhao, presented his concubine Consort Zhao to Liu Bang, who then became pregnant with Liu Chang.

description.zh-cn: 前196年，淮南王黥布谋反被诛后，刘长被封为淮南王。
description.en: In 196 BCE, after Qing Bu, the King of Huainan, was executed for rebellion, Liu Chang was enfeoffed as the new King of Huainan.

description.zh-cn: 因刘长谋反，汉文帝下令将其废黜王爵并发配蜀郡，刘长在途中绝食自杀。
description.en: Due to Liu Chang's rebellion, Emperor Wen ordered him stripped of his royal title and exiled to Shu Commandery, which led to Liu Chang's suicide by starvation en route.

description.zh-cn: 刘安是刘长的长子。
description.en: Liu An was the eldest son of Liu Chang.

description.zh-cn: 刘长安在其父刘长死后，继承了淮南王的爵位。
description.en: Liu An inherited the title of King of Huainan after the death of his father, Liu Chang.

description.zh-cn: 刘安是《淮南子》的作者（主编）。
description.en: Liu An was the author (patron and chief editor) of the Huainanzi.

description.zh-cn: 赵国国相贯高曾图谋暗杀刘邦，但未成功。
description.en: Guan Gao, the Chancellor of Zhao, attempted to assassinate Liu Bang but failed.

description.zh-cn: 吕后因嫉妒，对身陷囹圄的赵姬不予理会，导致赵姬在生下刘长后愤而自杀。
description.en: Out of jealousy, Empress Lü ignored the plight of the imprisoned Consort Zhao, leading to Zhao's suicide after giving birth to Liu Chang.

description.zh-cn: 在赵姬下狱后，审食其未尽力向吕后争取将其释放，是赵姬自杀的原因之一。
description.en: After Consort Zhao was imprisoned, Shen Yiji did not make a strong effort to persuade Empress Lü to release her, contributing to her suicide.

description.zh-cn: 刘长之母赵姬自杀后，刘长由吕后抚养长大。
description.en: After his mother Consort Zhao committed suicide, Liu Chang was raised by Empress Lü.

description.zh-cn: 为报其母赵姬之仇，刘长亲自刺杀了审食其。
description.en: To avenge his mother, Consort Zhao, Liu Chang personally assassinated Shen Yiji.

description.zh-cn: 诸吕之乱平定后，皇位空缺，大臣们最终选择刘恒继位，是为汉文帝。
description.en: After the Lü Clan Disturbance was suppressed, the throne was vacant. The ministers eventually chose Liu Heng to succeed, who became Emperor Wen.

description.zh-cn: 在“夷灭诸吕”后，刘长与刘襄等人都是皇位的潜在竞争者。
description.en: After the Lü Clan Disturbance, Liu Chang and Liu Xiang were potential competitors for the imperial throne.

description.zh-cn: 刘长与汉文帝刘恒是同父异母的兄弟。
description.en: Liu Chang and Emperor Wen (Liu Heng) were half-brothers, sharing the same father.

description.zh-cn: 为谋反，刘长曾勾结匈奴。
description.en: Liu Chang conspired with the Xiongnu as part of his rebellion plot.

description.zh-cn: 为谋反，刘长曾勾结闽越。
description.en: Liu Chang conspired with the Minyue as part of his rebellion plot.

description.zh-cn: 在刘长谋反事败后，丞相张苍领群臣要求汉文帝将其处死。
description.en: After Liu Chang's rebellion plot was exposed, Chancellor Zhang Cang led the ministers in demanding his execution by Emperor Wen.

description.zh-cn: 大臣袁盎反对将刘长流放的处罚，认为此举会逼迫其自杀，从而损害皇帝声誉。
description.en: The official Yuan Ang opposed the punishment of exiling Liu Chang, arguing it would force him to commit suicide and thus damage the emperor's reputation.

description.zh-cn: 刘勃是刘长的儿子。
description.en: Liu Bo was a son of Liu Chang.

description.zh-cn: 刘赐是刘长的儿子。
description.en: Liu Ci was a son of Liu Chang.

description.zh-cn: 刘良是刘长的儿子。
description.en: Liu Liang was a son of Liu Chang.

description.zh-cn: 陈平与周勃等元老列侯在吕后死后，共同策划并执行了铲除吕氏外戚势力的行动。
description.en: After the death of Empress Lü, Chen Ping, along with Zhou Bo and other senior statesmen, planned and executed the purge of the Lü consort clan.

description.zh-cn: 周勃与陈平等元老列侯在吕后死后，共同策划并执行了铲除吕氏外戚势力的行动。
description.en: After the death of Empress Lü, Zhou Bo, along with Chen Ping and other senior statesmen, planned and executed the purge of the Lü consort clan.
